com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.physics

Class PolygonCollider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.isoterik.mgdx.Component
      • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.physics.Collider
        • com.isoterik.mgdx.m2d.components.physics.PolygonCollider

  • public class PolygonCollider
extends Collider
    A collider in the form of a convex polygon. Useful for oddly shaped game objects.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PolygonCollider

        public PolygonCollider(float[] vertices)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new instance given the vertices of the polygon. It is assumed the vertices are in x,y order and define a convex polygon. It is assumed that the exterior is the the right of each edge.
        Parameters:
        vertices - the vertices of the polygon
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the vertices array is null or empty

    • Method Detail

      • getFixtureDef

        public com.badlogic.gdx.physics.box2d.FixtureDef getFixtureDef()
        Description copied from class: Collider
        Creates a FixtureDef for this collider and return it. Concrete subclasses must implement this method
        Specified by:
        getFixtureDef in class Collider
        Returns:
        a FixtureDef for this collider
